Description:
Let Me Entertain You
If you are looking for a home that is big enough for the family but allows you to entertain year round, put this at the top of your list!
Just 4 years young this Porter Davis build is decked out with all the mod cons including an abundance of extras.
The fore of the home welcomes you with high ceilings and a wide hallway before entering the double doors through to the master suite including walk-in robe and full ensuite. The heart of the home is the expansive open plan kitchen meals and 1st living area. What makes this area so functional is the bifold doors providing the option to bring inside out and entertain in style. The custom kitchen includes stone bench tops, 900mm gas oven, custom window and stainless steel appliances overlooking the dining, living and outside area. The second living area/rumpus room also has sliding door access onto the undercover area. The rear of the home hosts the remaining 3 bedrooms all with built-in robes, main bathroom with tiled in bath and shower, separate toilet and laundry.
The undercover outdoor area and extended deck is the perfect place to entertain all year round, the garden shed and low maintenance gardens complete this fantastic home.
Features include, ducted heating, ceiling fans, feature walls, custom light fittings throughout, stone bench top, stainless steel appliances, storage facilities, floating floors, timber bifolds, extended deck area, garden shed, double lock up garage with remote access, internal/external access and garden shed.
Located in the ever popular growth corridor of Curlewis close to all amenities and just moments to the bay; this fantastic package is situated upon 481m2.

Description:
YOU WILL FALL IN LOVE WITH THIS BRAND NEW FAMILY ENTERTAINER
Brand new with a modern façade and upgraded luxuries this spacious family home with bay views in this sought after estate will appeal to the family buyers, investors or the holiday makers wanting to invest in the future. The ground floor is dedicated to family living with the open flowing floor plan, formal living at the front which is for quiet time or simply relax in the family area to entertain, quality kitchen and stone tops. 900 mm oven and dishwasher, ample space for dining and spending family time in the living area which has direct access to the undercover tiled alfresco area. Upstairs every family need is catered for, large master retreat walk in robe and stylish ensuite. Direct access to the front balcony overlooking the stunning bay views, three further double bedrooms again offering splendid bay views and BIR's. Study area is central for direct access for all the family. Family bathroom has all the modern features and comforts to complete the upstairs accommodation. Upgrades installed central heating, Evaporative cooling upstairs, alarm and intercom, internal access from the double remote garage and superb landscaping with low maintenance in mind. A spectacular result for any purchaser to fill a variety of family needs in a growth area with supermarket and bay views. You will LOVE living here.

Description:
The Pick Of The Litter!
The Facts (In Short):
-Stunning contemporary family home on an enviable land holding (544m2 approx)) with side access for the boat and/or caravan
-Free flowing open plan design boasting a jaw dropping 3.3m (approx) feature ceiling height in the kitchen/family/meals zone
-Beautifully light and bright; further enhanced with crisp neutral finishes
-Exposed aggregate driveway and pathways throughout; genuine family friendly backyard with the clever addition of an outdoor shower feature
-All the modern comforts; split system heating & cooling and ducted vacuum system
The Features:
A truly stunning contemporary family home boasts a free flowing open plan design. As you turn the key and take your first step inside you will be seduced by the towering and jaw dropping 3.3m (approx) ceiling height in the main living area; feature pendant lighting and port windows further enhance what is a wonderfully light and bright experience. A sleek kitchen design boasts excellent storage solutions; useable bench space, a clever breakfast bar and a striking black glass splash back. Glass sliding doors provide a seamless connection to an expansive outdoor entertaining zone (finished with exposed aggregate). A second living area offers a great vantage point to a 'good old fashioned' backyard; you can calmly enjoy a cup of coffee with a friend and keep a watchful eye on the kids as they play freely. An overly generous master bedroom is complete with a walk in robe and a stylish ensuite. All 3 remaining bedrooms have built in robes and have easy access to the family bathroom. This property is undoubtedly one of the finest within the Curlewis Estate; simply too many features to list but an inspection will not disappoint a buyer with the highest expectations for their 'next' home.

Description:
A Fine Modern Home
4 bedroom large open plan living all sitting pretty on a 543m2 allotment. This Simmonds home is only 5 years old in the popular Curlewis Estate. Super sized master bedroom has a walk through robe to a fantastic ensuite with a plus sized shower. Generous hall is tiled & leads you to the great open plan living zone which features the caesarstone bench top kitchen with a 900mm stainless steel gas fan forced oven, 5 burner gas cook top & range hood. Also you have a dishwasher & dual double pantries perfect to store trolleys of groceries. This entertaining living area also has two sliding doors for easy access to the backyard & a reverse cycle split system. Bedrooms 2, 3 & 4 all have built in robes with another split system in the 4th bedroom. A small living area close to the bedrooms would be perfect for kids or teenager's retreat. Central modern bathroom offers you a deep bath to unwind & relax in. Quaint backyard has an open deck to eat alfresco if you choose. Double car garage has internal access. Additional features are the gas ducted heating, solar hot water service, an alarm system & key lock windows. Handy to new shopping centres, medical facilities, schools & public transport not to mention just down the road is the Clifton Springs boat ramp & everything the bay has to offer so all your lifestyle needs are meet.

Description:
Bayview Estates Best Value for Money
Australia's award winning luxury home builder Gallery Homes has a stunning new product located in the ever popular Bayview Estate. This home represents value for money and concept of space with a well thought-out design.
A great addition to the investment portfolio, a fantastic option for downsizers or a great start for first home buyers, located only moments to the shopping precinct, public transport, Drysdale amenities including the boat ramp and The Dell at the end of Jetty Road. This location is simply ideal for all generations offering all that you need at your fingertips.
As you enter Love Street you are greeted with beautiful bay views and a well- kept street appeal. The home comprises 4 bedrooms all including ceiling fans, 3 with walk-in robes and 1 with built-in robes; the master suite enjoys a lavish ensuite with double shower, stone vanity, shower niche and toilet. The fore of the home is complete with a main bathroom also including a stone vanity top, shower niche and bath, separate toilet and storage cupboards. The heart of the home is the light filled open plan kitchen/ meals and living area with stacker doors onto the paved alfresco, 2nd living area and galley kitchen including walk-in pantry/ laundry, stone bench tops, gas stove top, dishwasher and microwave provision.
The home is situated on approx. 351m2 and enjoys manicured front and back gardens, paved alfresco including ceiling fans, outdoor power, clothes line, retaining walls and side gates.
Features of the home include window furnishings, ducted heating, split system heating/cooling, T.V points, data points, stone bench tops, ceiling fans, stacker sliding doors and double lock up garage with remote access, internal and external doors.
A quality built package in a convenient location available at such an affordable price point.

Description:
Entertainer with the Extras!!
Only a sweet 5 years old waiting for you is this immaculate Simmonds family home in the popular Curlewis Estate. On offer we have 4 bedrooms & 3 living areas featuring evaporative cooling plus ducted heating throughout. First living zone has street views which could be the formal lounge or even set it up as a parents retreat because it is opposite the spacious master bedroom. Master includes WIR's with a great sized ensuite styled by his & hers vanity basins. 2nd living area is tiled & has sliding doors to outside. Large 2nd bedroom has built in robes. Open plan kitchen is shining with a stainless steel 900mm oven, 5 burner gas cook top and range hood. Black granite bench tops & black tiles are just simply stunning against the white cupboards & drawers. A concrete wall is the highlight here in the 3rd living zone with impressive double sliding doors to the magnificent undercover deck just perfect for all year entertainment smartly enclosed with glass panels so you can watch kids securely at play or even see the pets roam. Central bathroom has a deep luxurious bath, single vanity basin and separate shower. Bedrooms 3 & 4 are mirror images with BIR robes. Step straight outside from the laundry to the clothes line & garden shed. Double car garage with internal & rear access. On a 543m2 approx block close to new shopping centres, medical facilities, schools and public transport not to mention just down the road is the Clifton Springs boat ramp and everything the bay has to offer so all your needs are meet.

Close to the Fun Things in Life
Looking to go fishing? The boat ramp is nearby. Want to play golf? The golf course is nearby. Enjoy riding bikes? The bike trail is nearby. Restaurants, cafes, wineries are also close by. Are you getting the message? A neighbourhood that provides everything required for the everyday needs and the fun stuff too. Donâ??t want the hassle of building, but would like a near new home? Looking for open plan, high ceilings and private alfresco dining? Then come and check this out this home. Curlewis has become a suburb of choice to live in. It now has an established shopping centre. Supermarket, medical centre, chemist, and cafe right at your door. Walking distance to local primary school, tennis court and skate park means family fun is just around corner.

Description:
Quality Build Boasting Style & Luxury
A striking street presence is the first hint as to what you may expect inside this stunningly executed, custom built three bedroom home. Strong contemporary lines, heightened ceilings and luxury finishes gift a modern edge throughout, with multiple decking areas harnessing the indoor/outdoor lifestyle we all desire. Presentation is key to engage your audience - this one’s a showstopper!
-The immediate ‘wow factor’ is felt upon entry into this brightly lit, modern masterpiece
-Square-set 2.7 metre ceilings, amplify the sense of space throughout the interior spaces
-Luxurious in scale and soft furnishings, the master suite boasts stunning ensuite bathroom and WIR
-Floor to ceiling porcelain tiles, dual shower heads and timber vanity tops further gift that 5 star feel
-Bespoke joinery is enjoyed in the adjacently set dressing room, with ample storage solutions for him and her
-A second living space has a built in media unit and soundproofing, with the potential for use as a 4th bedroom
-OP design embraces sunny orientation across the kitchen, living and meals zone, spilling onto outdoor decking
-The fussiest of cooks will be impressed with the high functioning, U-shaped kitchen area with quality 900mm apps
-LED lighting, Caesarstone benchtops, soft closing cabinetry and walk in pantry with automated lighting
-Undercover with built in natural gas BBQ, fridge and outdoor heating, the alfresco deck is an entertainers delight
-Built-in timber seating completes this outdoor setting, the perfect spot to gather with friends and family
-Fully landscaped with feature lighting, the low maintenance back yard enjoys the simplicity of synthetic turf
-Spotted Gum features are a continued theme throughout the home, prioritising individuality and quality
-Ducted heating/cooling, R/C air con, ducted vacuum and fully automated security system are further mod cons
-This idealistic location is perfect for families, young professionals and retirees, a short stroll to all practicalities
A quality built, sophisticated home that stands out from the crowd. Make it yours today!

Description:
Presented To Please
Just a mere 5 years old this 3 bedroom Burbank family home in the very popular Curlewis Estate is just waiting for you to move in & call your own. Master bedroom has ceiling fan, reverse cycle spilt system & walk through robe to full ensuite. Bedrooms 2 & 3 both have ceiling fans & built in robes. Large modern bathroom has a super deep bath to relax & unwind in, separate shower & single vanity basin. Laundry has sliding doors for easy accessibility to the clothes line & rear yard. Open plan living boasts super functional kitchen with stainless steel 900ml electric oven & 5 burner gas cook top plus dishwasher with the perfect dining area sitting nicely alongside. Family living area has sliding doors to outside deck, neat gardens all secured by high colour bond fences. Double car garage has internal access and rear access perfect to store a boat or caravan. Additional features are ducted gas heating & solar hot water service. Close to the new shopping centre with medical facilities & chemist. A short drive to local schools, plus everything the bay has to offer including the boat ramp & the Dell. Perfect to add to your investment portfolio, first home or even down sizer so all your boxes are ticked.

Description:
She's Apples In Appleby!
If your buying criteria demands a quality build, a generous and adaptable floor plan, light and bright finishes and 'nothing to do' than look no further!
Boasting an expansive floor plan; 4 genuine double bedrooms (master complete with a walk in robe and ensuite) and 2 equally generous living areas means this home 'wants' for nothing.
The kitchen not only delivers a user friendly 'space' but it is also eye catching with its quality fixtures; dual Caesar stone bench tops, 900mm gas cooker and a lovely tiled splash back. Light and bright finishes further enhance an abundance of natural light and create a fresh crisp 'feel'. Double glass sliding doors create a seamless connection to a fully enclosed alfresco area and landscaped gardens.
A separate living area offers further scope to what is already a very adaptable floor plan.
Offering all the modern comforts; ducted heating, split system air conditioning, double remote garage and many more extras make this home a must see!
Insights: 32 Appleby Street, Curlewis VIC 3222 was last sold in 2017 and 40 other 4 bedroom house in Curlewis have recently been sold.

Description:
Modern and ready for you
Open cancelled due to sale. This home is modern, spacious and ready for the next lucky buyer. Just 4 years new, with a modern and warm vibe, the main attraction are the large spaces. Master bedroom comes with double vanity ensuite and walk in closet. The formal lounge is perfect for the family to retreat while the living areas has a fantastic gas heater. The modern kitchen is ideal for entertainment and those big family meals as it has a unique butler's pantry. The other two bedrooms, one of which is simply massive, come with built in robes. Covered alfresco with an easy maintenance backyard to complete this wonderful property, ready to be called home. Double garage with extra room for storage and internal access to the house.

Description:
Solid investment in growth area.
If it's a secure investment you are looking for, your search is over. Less than 2 years old this home consists of four bedrooms, three with built in robes, master bedroom complete with walk in robe and ensuite.
Consisting of 2 living areas, the north facing open plan lounge, meals and kitchen is
a bright, light filled space for the family along with a second lounge for keeping all the family occupied. A separate courtyard off the dining area is perfect for summer BBQ's. The kitchen is fully equipped with dishwasher, 900mm gas hot plates, electric oven and Caesarstone bench tops. Central heating and double garage with internal access complete this low maintenance property.
Currently leased at $380 per week by excellent tenants, this property would make the perfect investment to start or add to your existing portfolio. This well-presented and maintained property is just 500m from Bayview Central Curlewis Shopping Centre, walking distance to schools, boat ramp for the fisherman and amazing golf course. Just a short drive to some of the best wineries and breweries the Bellarine Peninsula has to offer, the lifestyle choices here are abundant.

Description:
A Stunning Setting - Ready for you to build your dream home!
If you’re looking for land on the Bellarine Peninsula, look no further than this large block of land approximately 884m2. Its elevated North facing positions provide opportunities for enchanting views over Port Phillip Bay, the You Yangs and beyond to the Melbourne Skyline.
Located in the stunning ‘Baywater Estate’ – you can build your dream home and be only a short stroll to the foreshore and the beach! A pedestrian boardwalk provides easy access to the beach from the top of the cliff. The boat harbour is less than a km away and offers a family friendly playground plus a viewing platform. The Foreshore Park and attractions are already proving popular with local families and visitors. Extensive areas of open space and parkland are also provided along Griggs Creek.
Your new home or holiday sanctuary is within walking distance to shops, schools, parks and the Bay. Well connected to the charming township of nearby Drysdale and its host of established community services and networks will have you feel at home in no time!
Curlewis is set to become one of the most sought – after new addresses on the Bellarine Peninsula. Perfectly positioned, you’ll never want to leave.
For more information, be sure to enquire today!
Roncon Real Estate – An Agency like no other!
All stated dimensions and areas are approximate. Particulars herein are for information only and do not constitute representation by the Owner or Agent.
